summary: Kris Kelvin joins the space station orbiting the planet Solaris, only to find its two crew members plagued by "phantoms," creations of Solaris. Kelvin is soon confronted with his own phantom, taking the shape of his dead wife Hari.
cast: Vasiliy Lanovoy|Antonina Pilyus|Vladimir Etush|Viktor Zozulin|Vyacheslav Dugin|A. Katsynsky
keywords: outer space|space mission|trapped in space|based on book|based on novel
director: Directors: Lidiya Ishimbaeva (as L. Ishimbaeva), Boris Nirenburg
title: Solyaris
